application-template.name: Metadata Enhancement
application-template.description: This application generates a JSON format meta data file from the user provided input data file. If the user also provides an initial meta data file, it will be merged into the output metadata file, which is based on the input data file name, with suffix "meta.json". Also, if the input data is a CSV file in delimited format, this app will generate a copy in JSON text records format. The path and name of the copy will be the same as the input data file plus the suffix ".json".
